citeinfo.origin: Digital Social Science Center (DSSC), Columbia University Libraries
citeinfo.title: Ville De Tranquebar, Et Fort Danois De Dansbourg, 1756

descript.abstract: This is a scanned version of the 1756 paper map entitled: Ville De Tranquebar, Et Fort Danois De Dansbourg. The map was scanned at 300 dots per inch and is in the TIFF format.
descript.purpose: Scanned maps may be used for a variety of purposes.
descript.supplinf: 1 Map ; 27 x 18 cm Ca. 1:2 000 In: Histoire gnrale des voyages, ou nouvelle collection de toutes les relations de voyages par mer et par terre. - [Hrsg.: Antoine F. Prvost D'Exiles] Nouvelle dition La Haye u.a. Band 14, 1756. - Zwischen S. 130 u. 131 (DE-MnBSB)BV012062890

cntorgp.cntorg: Research Data Services (RDS), Columbia University Libraries

idinfo.datacred: Thanks to Prof. Frances Pritchett, Columbia University, for providing the original paper map for this scan.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3500

dataqual.logic: The raster image is a faithfully reproduced digital image of the original source map. Some differences may be detected between the source graphic used and the raster image due to the RGB values assigned that particular color. The intent is to recreate those colors as near as possible.
dataqual.complete: Data completeness for digitized paper map files reflect the content of the source graphic.

citeinfo.title: Ville De Tranquebar, Et Fort Danois De Dansbourg

procstep.procdesc: Original map was scanned at 300 dpi and saved in .tiff format with Colortrac5480 Scanner
